entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
